casename: Han Min v First Commercial Bank and Others (First Commercial Bank, Third Party)
counsel: Davinder Singh SC, Jimmy Yim SC, Julian Kwek, Eugene Quah and Sameer Advani (Drew & Napier) for the plaintiff; Alan Wong Hoi Ping and Wee Hsiang Ling (William Lai & Alan Wong) for the first defendant/third party (up to 27 December 2001); Michael Hwang SC and Valerie Tan (Allen & Gledhill) for the first defendant/third party (from 27 December 2001); R Palakrishnan SC and Malathi Das (Palakrishnan & Partners) for the second defendant (up to 19 October 2001); Hee Theng Fong and Chua Ai Chun (Hee Theng Fong & Co) for the third defendant (up to 17 October 2001)
